name: object-graph-as-json
description: Library for representing arbitrary javascript objects in JSON.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:embeddable && npm run build:gen:embed && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: BABEL_MODULES=cjs babel src/ gen-src/ --out-dir lib/ --ignore src/**/*.test.js
scripts.build:esm: BABEL_MODULES=false babel src/ gen-src/ --out-dir esm/ --ignore src/**/*.test.js

author: Jacob Williams <jacobaw@gmail.com>
